sp_instance.title: Welcome
sp_instance.widget_parameters:
{ "html": { "value": "

Send a Recognition

Employee appreciation is vital to an outstanding workplace. The recognition form offers an easy way to show your appreciation to a team member that has exceeded expectations. Recognitions will be sent directly to the employee's manager and be displayed in the Recent Recognition board. Nominees will also receive points which can be redeemed for various experiences and prizes.

Recognition Point Values

  • Nominees receive 5 Points
  • Nominators receive 1 Point
", "displayValue": "

Recognitions will be sent directly to the employee's manager and be displayed in the Recent Recognition board.   • Nominators receive 1 Point
